notes.title: Meeting with Marketing Team
notes.content:

- Review social media performance
- Brainstorm new campaign ideas

## Attendees

- Alice Smith
- Bob Johnson
- Carol Lee

## Notes

- Launching a Halloween-themed promotion might increase engagement

notes.title: Research on React Frameworks
notes.content:
## Goals

- Research top React frameworks
- Create a list of pros and cons for each framework
- Determine which framework to use for the next project

## Frameworks

### Next.js

#### Pros

- Built-in server-side rendering
- Automatic code splitting and optimized asset serving
- Excellent TypeScript support

#### Cons

- Steep learning curve
- Limited configuration options
- May not be suitable for smaller projects

### Gatsby

#### Pros

- Excellent performance and SEO
- Large ecosystem of plugins and starters
- Built-in image optimization and lazy loading

#### Cons

- Not ideal for complex backends
- Learning curve for GraphQL
- Smaller community compared to Next.js

### Create React App

#### Pros

- Easy to set up and use
- Flexible and configurable
- Good for small to medium-sized projects

#### Cons

- Limited out-of-the-box functionalities
- No server-side rendering
- No built-in state management library

## Conclusion

After careful consideration, we decided to use Next.js for the next project. Its support for server-side rendering and TypeScript, along with its performance and asset optimization features, make it the ideal choice for our needs.

notes.title: Ideas for Brand Refresh
notes.content:
## Goals

- Come up with a new visual identity for the brand
- Identify brand strengths and values
- Brainstorm creative ways to communicate the brand message

## Strengths and Values

- Innovative and cutting-edge
- High-quality and reliable
- Customer-centric and responsive

## Brand Identity

- Color palette to represent innovation and reliability
- Creative tagline to communicate responsiveness and customer-centricity
- Consistent visual styles across all channels (website, social media, print, etc.)

## Next Steps

- Consult with creative agency for a brand redesign proposal
- Gather feedback from internal stakeholders and customers
- Develop a timeline and budget for the brand refresh

notes.title: Notes from Conference Talk
notes.content:
## Speaker

Name: John Doe

Company: Big Tech

## Topic

Title: The Future of Artificial Intelligence

## Key Takeaways

- AI has the potential to revolutionize many industries, from healthcare to transportation
- Ethical considerations and bias need to be addressed in AI development
- The role of humans in the workforce will evolve with AI, not disappear

## Additional Resources

- [Article on AI Ethics](https://hbr.org/2018/04/why-companies-that-keep-their-promises-earn-more-customers)
- [Book on AI in Healthcare](https://www.amazon.com/AI-Healthcare-Innovations-Challenges-Future/dp/0198844339)

notes.title: Personal Goals and Reflections
notes.content:
## Goals

- Finish reading 'Infinite Jest'
- Exercise for at least 30 minutes every day
- Learn to cook a new dish

## Reflections

- I've been struggling to find the motivation to exercise lately
- 'Infinite Jest' is a challenging but rewarding book so far
- Cooking helps me relax and feel accomplished

## Next Steps

- Schedule exercise time in my calendar
- Join a virtual book club to discuss 'Infinite Jest'
- Research new recipes to try
